app.title: Atomic Playground
app.subtitle: Interactive atoms, valence, and molecule creation

home.heroSubtitle: Learn how electrons move, how valence shells form, and how bonds emerge.

modeDescriptions.realistic: Realistic mode adds wobble, glowing shells, and starry depth to highlight how orbits lean and stretch in space.
modeDescriptions.simplified: Simplified mode flattens orbits, mutes glow, and removes extra noise so you can focus on structure without distractions.

legend.title: Color legend
legend.description: Use the soft colors to match objects in the scene: the warm gold ring marks the valence shell, lavender dashes hint at bond directions, and coral/teal dots show protons, neutrons, and electrons.

oxygen.label: Oxygen
oxygen.summary: Oxygen has three occupied shells with six valence electrons that seek bonds to stabilize the outer shell.
oxygen.structure: Two electrons fill the first shell, six more occupy the second and third shells, creating a reactive valence shell.

hydrogen.label: Hydrogen
hydrogen.summary: Hydrogen contains a single proton and electron, making it highly reactive and eager to share electrons.
hydrogen.structure: One electron orbits close to the nucleus with no inner shielding, so it pairs easily with other atoms.

helium.label: Helium
helium.summary: Helium carries two protons, two neutrons, and a full first shell, resulting in an inert, stable atom.
helium.structure: Both electrons sit in the first shell, leaving no valence electrons and making helium chemically noble.

molecule.title: Molecule builder
molecule.subtitle: Attach atoms and watch bonds animate

settings.title: Settings

classic.label: Classic
classic.description: Classic view keeps orbital paths tidy and minimizes noise for quick exploration.

quantum.label: Quantum
quantum.description: Quantum view emphasizes probability clouds, wobble, and layered glow for a more energetic scene.

settings.quantumIntensityHint: Increase to amplify orbital wobble; lower it to keep clouds calmer.
settings.loggingHint: Toggles runtime logs for debugging individual modules.
settings.reducedMotionHint: Softens particle wobble and glow pulses for sensitive viewers.
